top10_tweets_like:
Have you ever cursed at your computer trying to get the right sizing of text etc in plots when you render it to a file? This one trick will help you regain sanity! #rstats 

https://t.co/kELor6SqZH

Since this has been coming up a lot, I've updated my "Regression in R" lecture: https://t.co/QZrGzCR4P6 

It's got everything from OLS to high-dimensional FEs to clustered SEs to regression tables to.. etc. Basically, all the tools I use in my own workflow. 

#econtwitter #rstats https://t.co/2JrSGyybIz

I have updated the *Data Science Course in a Box* resources at https://t.co/N21dyees9Y. If you're teaching introductory data science with #rstats, take a look and feel free to use/adapt as you like. Source code for all materials are linked from the website and licensed CC BY-SA! https://t.co/uw9HrzffkD
